constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of detached garage/gym to rear of property
decision_conditions: The proposed building would be located within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse and its height would exceed 2.5 metres. The development would therefore fail to meet the requirements of E.1(e)(ii) of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would not be lawful.

B.1 (d) states that development in not permitted if the cubic content of the resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more thanâ€”(i) 40 cubic metres in the case of a terrace house, or(ii) 50 cubic metres in any other case;

Please provide existing and proposed site plan as mention in the check list drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The site plan should show all public rights of way crossing or adjoining the site and should also show access arrangements, all trees and hedges within the application site and on the boundary, including trees and hedges on neighbouring land.  The plan should be annotated with key measurements, including distances to boundaries. The plan(s) must be given a unique drawing number and be clearly labelled as Existing or Proposed Site Plan. The Site Plan must show the direction of North.
